category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: BOM_bypass_occ_eff_evaluation
preference.preference_description: Bypasses the Occurrence Effectivity evaluation, and considers all the Occurrences as configured in regardless of the defined Effectivity. The Teamcenter server needs to be restarted for change in the value of this preference to take effect. Valid Values: * true: Occurrences will always be configured in. * false: Occurrence effectivity will be evaluated as per their Revision Rule. This is the default value.
